scan_metadata.scan_methodology: Multi-source web scanning across news, academic, industry reports, and policy documents
scan_metadata.deduplication_note: Filtered against 69 existing signals in archive-index.json

signals.title: AMD Unveils Ryzen AI 400 Series and MI440X GPU at CES 2026
signals.summary: AMD Chair and CEO Dr. Lisa Su unveiled new AI-focused products at CES 2026, including the Ryzen AI 400 Series for next-gen AI PCs, the MI440X GPU for enterprise, and the Ryzen AI Halo developer platform. AMD also announced a commitment of $150 million to bring AI into more classrooms and communities.
signals.significance: High - Major AI chip announcement with education investment

signals.title: Boston Dynamics Atlas Humanoid Robot Becomes Commercial Product (2028 Launch)
signals.summary: Boston Dynamics' Atlas humanoid robot is now a commercial product heading to factory deployments in 2028. The electric Atlas was formally introduced at CES 2026 in its first public stage appearance, demonstrating autonomous rising from flat position using non-human joint-flipping maneuvers.

signals.title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Hands-On at CES 2026 - $2,500 10-inch AMOLED
signals.summary: CES 2026 offered the first hands-on experience with Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold, priced around $2,500 in Korea, featuring 10 inches of vivid AMOLED display. Represents next evolution in foldable smartphone form factors.

signals.title: D-Wave Achieves Scalable On-Chip Cryogenic Control for Gate-Model Qubits
signals.summary: D-Wave demonstrated scalable, on-chip cryogenic control for gate-model qubits, claiming to be first in industry to do so. This breakthrough overcomes a long-standing obstacle to building commercially viable and scalable gate-model quantum computers.
signals.significance: High - Major quantum computing scalability breakthrough

signals.title: Quantum Error Correction Achieves Ultimate Accuracy with Ultra-Fast Efficiency
signals.summary: Research team achieved both ultimate accuracy and ultra-fast computational efficiency in quantum error correction, removing a major obstacle to large-scale practical quantum computers. New method maintains minimal time needed for error-correction computation even as components grow.
signals.significance: High - Critical enabler for practical quantum computing

signals.title: Quantum No-Cloning Problem Solved - Enables Quantum Cloud Storage
signals.summary: University of Waterloo researchers made breakthrough that elegantly bypasses the fundamental quantum no-cloning problem, enabling quantum cloud storage that safely stores same quantum information on multiple servers as redundant encrypted backup.
signals.significance: High - Major breakthrough for quantum information security

signals.title: Quantum Structured Light Transforms Secure Communication and Computing
signals.summary: Scientists are engineering light in multidimensional ways that dramatically increase how much information a single photon can carry, making quantum communication more secure, quantum computers more efficient, and sensors far more sensitive.
signals.significance: High - Advances multiple quantum technology applications

signals.title: Mobileye Acquires Mentee Robotics for $900M - Physical AI Push
signals.summary: Mobileye announced entry into definitive agreement to acquire Mentee Robotics Ltd., an AI-first humanoid robotics company, for $900 million. Signals major strategic shift toward physical AI and humanoid robotics market.
signals.significance: High - Major acquisition signaling Physical AI industry consolidation

signals.title: EngineAI T800 Humanoid Robot Launches at $25,000 - Mid-2026 Shipments
signals.summary: EngineAI introduced T800 humanoid robot at CES 2026 with starting price of $25,000 and first shipments scheduled for mid-2026. Represents significant price reduction compared to earlier humanoid robot offerings.
signals.significance: Medium - Price point accessibility for humanoid robots

signals.title: Hyundai Motor Group Announces AI Robotics Strategy at CES 2026
signals.summary: Hyundai Motor Group announced comprehensive AI Robotics Strategy to lead human-centered robotics era at CES 2026, integrating robotics across automotive and manufacturing operations.
signals.significance: High - Major automotive player's strategic robotics commitment

signals.title: Qualcomm Introduces Full Suite of Robotics Technologies for Physical AI
signals.summary: Qualcomm introduced full suite of robotics technologies at CES 2026, powering Physical AI from household robots up to full-size humanoids, establishing comprehensive hardware/software platform for robotics industry.
signals.significance: High - Infrastructure provider enabling Physical AI ecosystem

signals.title: CRISPR Breakthrough: Gene Activation Without DNA Cutting
signals.summary: UNSW Sydney scientists developed new CRISPR technique that activates genes without cutting DNA by removing methyl groups. This gentler gene editing approach could offer safer way to treat Sickle Cell disease by reactivating fetal blood genes.

signals.title: Aurora Therapeutics Launches with $16M - CRISPR Regulatory Pathway
signals.summary: Aurora Therapeutics launched with $16M from Menlo Ventures, with CRISPR co-inventor Jennifer Doudna as advisor. Betting on FDA opening new regulatory pathway for bespoke personalized gene-editing therapies, endorsed by FDA head Martin Makary in November.
signals.significance: High - Regulatory pathway shift for gene therapy

signals.title: Gen Z Intentional Living and Analog Revival - 2026 Lifestyle Shift
signals.summary: Gen Z in 2026 embraces intentional living and emotional grounding, gravitating toward slower, more meaningful experiences. More than 25% of Gen Z and Millennials report rediscovering handwriting or letter-sending as analog revival accelerates in response to digital fatigue.

signals.title: 79% of Gen Z Disillusioned with Dating Apps - Offline Connection Resurgence
signals.summary: 79% of Gen Z in the U.S. have become disillusioned with dating apps and increasingly crave meaningful interactions and spaces for social connection. Signals shift from digital-first dating to offline community-based connections.

signals.title: Gen Z Loud Budgeting Movement - 93% Mindful Dining Spending
signals.summary: Gen Z focused on 'Loud Budgeting' on platforms like TikTok, with 93% of Gen Z in America and Europe being mindful of their spending when dining out, and 70% using TikTok to discover new restaurants. Financial transparency becomes social norm.

signals.title: EU Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) Fully Operational Jan 1, 2026
signals.summary: EU CBAM enters full operational status January 1, 2026. EU importers must buy and surrender CBAM certificates corresponding to CO2 emissions embedded in exports, priced at €70-€100 per tonne. Covers steel, aluminum, cement, fertilizers, electricity, and hydrogen.
signals.significance: Very High - Major global trade and climate policy implementation

signals.title: EU ETS Maritime Transport Full Compliance - Methane and N2O Included
signals.summary: January 2026 marks turning point for EU Emissions Trading System as maritime transport faces full compliance. From January 2026, methane (CH4) and nitrous oxide (N2O) emissions from maritime transport also fall under EU ETS alongside CO2.

signals.title: California SB 253 Climate Disclosure: Scope 1/2 Reporting Due June 30, 2026
signals.summary: California SB 253 requires U.S.-based companies with over $1 billion annual revenue doing business in California to report Scope 1 and 2 greenhouse gas emissions by June 30, 2026. Represents major state-level climate disclosure mandate.

signals.title: Andreessen Horowitz Raises $15B - Equals 18% of 2025 U.S. VC Total
signals.summary: Andreessen Horowitz announced $15 billion fundraising in early January 2026, equaling 18% of all VC dollars allocated in U.S. in 2025. Firm now manages $90B AUM. Allocation: $6.75B growth, $1.7B each for apps/infrastructure, $1.2B defense, $700M biotech/health.
signals.significance: Very High - Massive VC fund concentration

signals.title: xAI Raises $20B - One of Largest Venture Rounds Ever
signals.summary: First week of 2026 brought $20 billion funding round for Elon Musk's xAI, marking one of largest venture rounds to date. Signals continued massive capital deployment in AI infrastructure and foundation models.

signals.title: Alternative Protein Investment Crashes - Cultivated Meat Only $36M in 9 Months
signals.summary: Alternative protein companies raised only $611M in Q1-Q3 2025 (plant-based $322M, fermentation $253M, cultivated meat/seafood only $36M). After high-profile failures including SCiFi Foods, Believer Meats, Meatable, industry enters 2026 leaner and more realistic.
signals.significance: High - Industry shakeout and capital retrenchment

signals.title: NASA Artemis II SLS Rocket Rollout in Early January 2026
signals.summary: NASA officials confirmed rollout of SLS rocket for Artemis II in first half of January 2026, with potential launch as early as February. Represents critical step in return to human lunar exploration.

signals.title: ESA Announces €8.26B Budget for 2026 - SMILE Mission Planned
signals.summary: ESA Director General Josef Aschbacher detailed agency's plan for 2026 with €8.26B budget allocation. ESA and CAS plan to launch joint heliophysics mission SMILE in March or April 2026.

signals.title: Korea Education Ministry Shifts from 'AI Digital Textbooks' to 'AI Learning Resources'
signals.summary: Korea's Ministry of Education announced 2026 policy plan moving away from 'AI Digital Textbooks' terminology toward broader 'AI Learning Resources' category, encompassing courseware, edtech, and various digital learning tools beyond single textbook concept.
signals.significance: Medium - Policy terminology shift reflects implementation challenges

signals.title: Korea Establishes 'AI Talent Support Bureau' - Organization Restructuring Jan 1
signals.summary: Korea Education Minister confirmed organizational restructuring with 'AI Talent Support Bureau' establishment effective January 1, 2026. Reflects national priority on AI education and talent development infrastructure.

signals.title: Proactive Mental Health and Emotional Fitness Movement in 2026
signals.summary: In 2026, emotional wellness becomes proactive and preventive, treated like physical fitness rather than reactive therapy. 42% of Gen Z and millennials say mindfulness is 'very high priority' versus 29% of baby boomers. Bottom-up approaches like EMDR, breathwork, somatic experiencing become standard.
signals.significance: High - Paradigm shift in mental health approach

signals.title: Vagus Nerve Stimulation Becomes Mainstream Wellness Trend
signals.summary: In 2026, focus shifts to stimulating vagus nerve, key pathway in body's stress-regulation system connecting brain, heart, gut and immune system. Represents move toward body-based stress management approaches.

signals.title: Illinois Targets 3 GW Grid-Scale Energy Storage by 2030
signals.summary: Illinois announced target of 3 GW grid-scale energy storage by 2030 as part of clean energy transition strategy. Represents significant state-level battery storage commitment.

signals.title: Silicon Batteries Enter Large-Scale Deployment in EVs and Data Centers
signals.summary: 2026 will see first large-scale deployment of silicon batteries in EVs. Extreme fast discharge feature makes silicon batteries solution for AI-enabled data centers. Expected to emerge as critical component of infrastructure needed to power AI data centers.

signals.title: California Battery Capacity Surges 2,100% Since 2019 - Leads World Except China
signals.summary: California's 2,100% battery capacity surge since 2019 includes 13,880 MW from utility-scale projects, 2,213 MW from batteries on 200,000+ homes, 849 MW at businesses/schools/government. California now has more battery capacity than any jurisdiction except China.
signals.significance: High - Major regional energy infrastructure transformation

signals.title: Korea 2026 Minimum Wage: 10,320 Won/Hour (2.9% Increase)
signals.summary: Korea's 2026 minimum wage set at 10,320 won per hour, increase of 290 won (2.9%) from 2025. Represents continued wage growth amid inflationary pressures.

signals.title: Korea 'Yellow Envelope Law' Takes Effect March 2026
signals.summary: Korea's 'Yellow Envelope Law' (Labor Union Act amendments) takes effect March 2026. When prime contractors have substantial/concrete control over subcontract workers' working conditions, they can be recognized as employer enabling collective bargaining. Major labor relations shift.

signals.title: U.S. Immigration Fees Increase Jan 1, 2026 - 'More Expensive, Slower, Stricter'
signals.summary: U.S. Department of Homeland Security and USCIS raise fees from January 1, 2026 for asylum, temporary stay permits (Parole), TPS, work permits (EAD), ESTA, EVUS and numerous other procedures. Immigration characterized as 'more expensive, slower, stricter' in 2026.

signals.title: U.S. CLARITY Act for Crypto Expected Passage Jan 15, 2026
signals.summary: Crypto Legal Accountability, Registration and Transparency for Investors Act (CLARITY Act) approved in U.S. Congress, moving through Senate with expected passage January 15, 2026. Landmark legislation intended to end era of 'regulation by enforcement'.
signals.significance: Very High - Major crypto regulatory framework

signals.title: SEC Approves Generic Exchange Listing Standards for Crypto ETPs
signals.summary: U.S. SEC approved new generic exchange listing standards for crypto exchange-traded products on accelerated basis. Eligible funds can list without full 19b-4 rule-change process, shortening approval timelines from 240 days to as little as 75 days.
signals.significance: High - Streamlined crypto product approval process

signals.title: Morgan Stanley Files to Launch Bitcoin and Solana ETFs
signals.summary: Morgan Stanley filed to launch Bitcoin and Solana ETFs, signaling major U.S. banks no longer sitting on sidelines. Bank of America began allowing wealth advisers to recommend crypto allocations in client portfolios at start of 2026.

signals.title: Bitcoin ETF Assets Projected to Reach $180-220B by End of 2026
signals.summary: Bitcoin ETF assets under management expected to reach $180-220 billion by year-end 2026, up from approximately $100-120 billion currently. Bloomberg Intelligence projects 2026 could see $15B in conservative case or surge toward $40B under favorable conditions.

signals.title: Skills Gap Becomes Defining Labor Market Challenge - Not Job Displacement
signals.summary: Rather than machines replacing humans in 2026, year marked by emergence of new divide: skills gap. 2026 marks when agentic AI begins displacing jobs rather than merely augmenting them. White-collar roles at junior to mid-levels face greatest immediate risk.
signals.significance: Very High - Labor market structural shift

signals.title: Skills-Based Hiring Reaches 65% of Employers for Entry-Level Positions
signals.summary: 65% of employers surveyed adopted skills-based hiring practices for entry-level hires, marking significant shift in recruitment. Entry-level roles dropped 29% globally as experienced talent in technology, data, analytics becomes indispensable.

signals.title: 55% of CEOs Cite Innovation Inability Due to Skills Lack - Reskilling Priority
signals.summary: 55% of CEOs cite inability to innovate due to lack of key skills, with 46% viewing retraining and upskilling as most effective solution. Signals major corporate reskilling investment wave.

signals.title: Hybrid Work Remains Dominant - 64% of Organizations Use Hybrid Model
signals.summary: About 64% of leaders report companies use hybrid model. However, 30% of organizations plan to reduce or eliminate remote work in 2026. 'Hybrid creep' emerges as trend where companies gradually increase mandatory office days.

signals.title: 85% of Workers Prioritize Flexibility Over Salary
signals.summary: 85% of workers prioritize flexibility over salary. 40% of U.S. workers would accept 95% or less of current salary for remote work option. Among tech workers, many willing to accept 25% lower salaries for hybrid or fully remote roles.

signals.title: U.S. Social Commerce Market to Reach $114.7B in 2025, $119B in 2027
signals.summary: U.S. social commerce market expected to reach $114.7B in 2025, growing 14.4% year-over-year, projected to exceed $119 billion in 2027. Social commerce becoming fully normalized by 2026 with in-app checkout options.

signals.title: Global Livestream Sales Projected to Exceed $1 Trillion by 2026
signals.summary: Global livestream sales projected to exceed $1 trillion by 2026, huge rise from $682.5 billion in 2023. China projected to reach approximately $1.11 trillion in 2026, while U.S. shopping market projected to hit $55-67.8 billion by 2026.
signals.significance: Very High - Trillion-dollar commerce channel emergence

signals.title: TikTok Shop U.S. Sales Projected to Reach $20-23.4B in 2026
signals.summary: TikTok Shop's U.S. sales alone projected to reach $20 billion to $23.4 billion in 2026. By 2026, 50% of all U.S. social commerce buyers expected to make purchase specifically on TikTok.

signals.title: U.S. Creator Economy Projected to Exceed $40B in 2026 - 4x Faster than Broader Media
signals.summary: U.S. creator economy projected to exceed $40 billion in 2026, with some estimates putting global creator economy exceeding $230 billion. IAB's 2025 report shows U.S. creator economy investment projected to reach $37B in 2025, growing about four times faster than broader media industry.
signals.significance: Very High - New media economy maturation

signals.title: 86% of Creators Use Generative AI to Power Content - 79% of Marketers Increase Spend
signals.summary: 86% of creators already use generative AI to power their content. 79% of marketers planning to increase spend in generative AI creator content in 2026, up from 70% in 2023. AI-generated content becomes mainstream in creator economy.
signals.significance: High - AI integration in content production

signals.title: Lucid-Nuro-Uber Robotaxi to Launch in San Francisco Late 2026
signals.summary: Lucid, Nuro, and Uber unveiled jointly developed global robotaxi at CES 2026. Testing already underway, Uber will launch self-driving taxi service in San Francisco area later in 2026. Plans to deploy up to 20,000 EVs on ride-hailing network over next six years.
signals.significance: Very High - Major robotaxi commercial deployment

signals.title: Neuralink to Begin High-Volume Production of BCI Devices in 2026
signals.summary: Neuralink will start high-volume production of brain-computer interface devices in 2026 and move to streamlined, almost entirely automated surgical procedure. Next-gen surgical robot capable of inserting electrode threads in about 1.5 seconds per thread.

signals.title: BCI Market Projected to Grow to $10.86B by 2032 at 14.61% CAGR
signals.summary: Global Brain Computer Interface (BCI) Market projected to grow at CAGR of 14.61% from 2026 to 2032, with market valued at USD 4.02 Billion in 2024 and expected to reach USD 10.86 Billion by 2032. Driven by neurotechnology advancements, EEG-based systems, and AI incorporation.

signals.title: TSMC Announces 'A16' Chipmaking Technology for 2H 2026 - Intel Showdown
signals.summary: TSMC announced new chip manufacturing technology called 'A16' will enter production in second half of 2026, setting up showdown with Intel over who can make world's fastest chips. Nearly three-quarters of TSMC's production at 7nm nodes and below.

signals.title: Intel Enters High-Volume Production of 18A Process - Core Ultra 3 'Panther Lake'
signals.summary: Intel entered high-volume production of 18A process node. Core Ultra series 3 PC processor, code-named Panther Lake, came to PCs in January as first major product made on 18A. CFO states 2026 will mark turning point for company's manufacturing plans.

signals.title: Colorado River States Face Feb 14, 2026 Deadline for Water Allocation Plan
signals.summary: Colorado River experiencing climate change-fueled drought for nearly two decades. Seven states that rely on river have until February 14, 2026 to submit water allocation plan to federal government as current operating guidelines expire in 2026.
signals.significance: Very High - Critical water resource crisis deadline

signals.title: Christianity Decline May Be Stabilizing in U.S. - 15,000 Churches Close in 2026
signals.summary: Recent data suggests possible slowing in long-term Christianity decline in United States, with religiously unaffiliated population plateauing after sustained growth. However, unprecedented 15,000 churches expected to shut doors in 2026. Only 45% of America's Gen Z identify as Christian.

signals.title: AI Chatbots for Spiritual Guidance Reach 30M+ Downloads - Bible Chat Example
signals.summary: AI and chatbot technology being used by millions for spiritual guidance, confession and prayer. Apps like Bible Chat reached more than 30 million downloads. Represents digitization and AI-integration of spiritual practice.

signals.title: Metaverse Enterprise Adoption: 30% of Organizations Have Products/Services Ready
signals.summary: By 2026, 30% of organizations worldwide will have products and services ready for metaverse. Enterprise adoption moved past hype into practical use, with companies adopting immersive environments to improve collaboration, training, and operational visibility. One in four people anticipated to spend at least an hour daily in virtual environments by 2026.

signals.title: 3D Bioprinting Achieves Vascularization Breakthrough - Functional Blood Vessel Networks
signals.summary: In 2026, bioprinting field sees breakthroughs in vascularization - ability to print tissues with fully functional blood vessel networks. AI integration expanded through Oct-Nov 2025 covering closed-loop print monitoring, ML-enabled slicer optimization, generative vascular design, reinforcement learning-based path planning.

next_steps.recommendation: Process signals through enrichment pipeline for significance scoring and trend analysis
